testcase.name: validating inputs validates numbers should validate the first numerical input and display an error if they are not a number
validating inputs validates numbers should validate the second numerical input and display an error if they are not a number
validating inputs validates operators should validate that a +, -, /, or * was used
validating inputs validates operators should validate that only one +, -, /, or * was used
Does math should be able to add
Does math should be able to subtract
Does math should be able to divide
Does math should be able to multiply
